get.description: Returns character activity data for a map.

parameters.description: Map identifier (UUID) - Either map_id or slug must be provided
parameters.name: map_id

parameters.description: Map slug - Either map_id or slug must be provided
parameters.name: slug

parameters.description: Optional: Number of days to look back for activity data.
parameters.name: days

example.error: Must provide either ?map_id=UUID or ?slug=SLUG as a query parameter

get.description: Retrieves structure timers for a map.

parameters.name: slug

parameters.description: Optional: System ID to filter timers for a specific system
parameters.name: system_id

parameters.name: map_id

parameters.name: slug

get.description: Returns characters grouped by user for a specific map.

parameters.description: Map identifier (UUID or slug). Provide either a UUID or a slug.
parameters.name: map_identifier

items.description: Character group information with main character identification

characters.description: List of characters belonging to a user

main_character_eve_id.description: EVE ID of the main character for this user on this map

200.description: User characters with main character indication

get.description: Legacy endpoint for retrieving system static information
Retrieves static information for a given solar system.
Lists the ACLs for a given map. Provide only one of map_id or slug as a query parameter. If both are provided, the request will fail.

parameters.description: Map slug - Provide only one of map_id or slug.
parameters.name: slug

parameters.description: Map slug - Provide only one of map_id or slug.
parameters.name: slug

description.description: Optional description of the access list

owner_eve_id.description: EVE character ID of the owner (must match an existing character)
